materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"4o2n3","text":"1. Dual-Luciferase® Reporter Assay System found here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":4}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ikf8","text":"2. FuGENE transfection reagent found here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":4}],"data":{}},{"key":"7euts","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F84F4C30038A11ED8CCE3761633E64B8","url":"https://www.promega.com/products/luciferase-assays/reporter-assays/dual_luciferase-reporter-assay-system/?catNum=E1910"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"39B67630038B11ED8CCE3761633E64B8","url":"https://www.promega.com/products/luciferase-assays/transfection-reagents/fugene-4k-transfection-reagent/?gclid=CjwKCAjw_b6WBhAQEiwAp4HyIHsq5PLcRsinq8dEiQlnlTNGAXR1zQ9fLIMS6Jue6uXbP7DXLl3UARoC28sQAvD_BwE\u0026catNum=E5911"}}}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ae34g","text":" Cell Lysing and Luciferase Assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b73g9","text":"Remove media from each well and wash with PBS; remove the PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2feek","text":"Add 50uL trypsin to each well and coat every cell","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cc2u","text":"Leave in incubator for 3 minutes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ipmm","text":"Pipette all cells off of plate and add cells to 1.5mL tubes ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1787p","text":"Spin down cells at 1,500RPM 4C for 5 minutes to pellet cells ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rpvq","text":"Remove supernatant ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50on6","text":"Re suspend cells in 50uL of PLB 1X Passive Lysis Buffer (PLB)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efu5c","text":"Incubate lysates on ice for at least five minutes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2pdc","text":"Vortex each tube for 10-15 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dja9f","text":"Incubate for 5-10 more minutes on ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ferlr","text":"Centrifuge the tubes at 12,000 rcf at 4C for two minutes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clbu3","text":"Transfer the supernatant of each tube to a new labeled tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffpar","text":"Either store the lysates at -80C or continue to the luciferase assay","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9u24j","text":"Cell culture ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ht9i","text":"If you are reading this, I am assuming that you already have 100,000 cells plated in each well of a 24-well TC plate (or something of equal measure)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40gq1","text":"Let them rest overnight because tomorrow you will transfect them ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ptn1","text":"The Luciferase Assay Itself","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uhlo","text":"Set up a GloMax luminometer to measure for 10 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8h87q","text":"For each sample you want to measure, add 20 uL of LARII and 20 uL lysate to a microfuge tube","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en25r","text":"Vortex the tube briefly","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ed7td","text":"Put the tube in the slot in the luminometer, close the lid, and measure","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ktt1","text":"Usually measure each sample two times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ensg","text":"Transfection (Transient) of Plasmid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"690vd","text":"Dual luciferase assays work by expressing and measuring two luciferase plasmids: Firefly Luciferase and Renilla luciferase, which helps normalize transfection efficiencies of the plasmids ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb4g3","text":"Assemble the following mixture for a 24 well plate: ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38elk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bovgu","text":"2uL of FuGENE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df4vp","text":"1uL plasmid A (200ng)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3gp5","text":"1uL plasmid B (200ng)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6113l","text":"50uL Optimem","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23ph6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhb3b","text":"Let sit for max 15 minutes ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dlgu","text":"Add dropwise to the cells ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fq8v","text":"Leave for 24 hours ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f902","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Dual Luciferase Assay
